item.title: 加拿大养老金在写字楼受到冲击后降低房地产风险敞口
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）在截至 3 月的财政年度中获得了 8%的回报率，股票、信贷和私募股权投资的两位数收益弥补了新兴市场和房地产的疲软表现。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board earned an 8% return in the fiscal year ended March, as double-digit gains in stocks, credit and private equity made up for weaker performance in emerging markets and real estate.】

item.title: 捷克汽车产量创纪录地达到 50 万辆里程碑
item.description: 今年前四个月，捷克共和国的汽车产量达到了一个新的里程碑，创纪录地生产了 50 多万辆汽车。【原文：The Czech Republic’s car output reached a new milestone in the first four months of the year, churning out more than a half a million automobiles in record time.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司新任首席执行官在亚马逊河口摊牌
item.description:
玛格达-尚布里亚特（Magda Chambriard）正在推动在巴西环境部长希望保护的近海地区进行钻探。【原文：

Magda Chambriard is pushing to drill in an offshore region that Brazil’s environment minister wants to protect.

】

item.title: 加密货币交易所交易产品获英国监管绿灯
item.description: 英国金融监管机构批准了首个加密货币交易所交易产品，这是英国在数字资产领域追赶其他金融中心的一步。【原文：The UK’s financial regulator approved the first cryptocurrency exchange-traded products, a step toward catching up to other financial centers in digital assets.】

item.title: 第 2 位 Anglo 股东 PIC 称必和必拓提案需要修订
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的第二大股东称，它认为必和必拓集团的收购提案需要 "有意义的修改"，该股东在公开评论中称，就在必和必拓集团提出收购要约或退出的最后期限几小时前，该公司提出了收购要约。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s second-largest shareholder said it believes BHP Group’s takeover proposal needs “meaningful revision,” in public comments issued just hours before a deadline for the bigger company to commit to an offer or walk away.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数公司通过剔除更多盈利项目提高利润
item.description: 一项新的分析发现，美国大公司正在通过从净收入中剔除诉讼费用和无形资产摊销等项目来提高调整后的每股收益，即使监管机构正在对这些做法进行严格审查。【原文：Large US companies are bolstering their adjusted earnings per share by excluding items such as litigation expenses and amortization of intangible assets from their net income, even as regulators scrutinize such practices, a new analysis finds.】

item.title: 股票交易量低得像暑假
item.description: 股票在上涨，兴奋却没有。【原文：Stocks are rising, excitement is not.】

item.title: 摩洛哥部长表示，摩洛哥正在考虑发行一年多来的首笔外国债券
item.description: 摩洛哥正在考虑在 2024 年发行国际债券，这是一年多来的第一次，因为这个正在努力恢复其投资等级的主权国家在减少预算赤字方面取得了进展。【原文：Morocco is considering issuing an international bond in 2024 for the first time in more than a year, as the sovereign that’s seeking to recover its investment grade makes headway in reducing the budget deficit.】

item.title: 红杉支持的以色列投资者 Cyberstarts 称其首支基金年回报率达 170
item.description: 以色列风险投资公司Cyberstarts表示，随着以色列网络安全市场的蓬勃发展，其第一支基金自2018年成立以来，年回报率已达到170%。【原文：Israeli venture capital firm Cyberstarts said its first fund has generated yearly returns of 170% since it was formed in 2018, as the country’s cybersecurity market has boomed.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。全世界都在等待英伟达（Nvidia）的财报，交易员们又受到了通胀的严重冲击，欧洲的汽车制造商也遇到了麻烦。以下是市场动态...... — David Goodman【原文：Good morning. The world waits for Nvidia earnings, traders get another nasty inflation shock and there’s trouble for car makers in Europe. Here’s what’s moving markets.. — David Goodman】

item.title: 美国报告显示石油库存膨胀，石油价格接近三个月低点
item.description: 在一份行业报告指出美国原油库存增加后，原油跌幅扩大，这增加了市场的看跌迹象。【原文：Oil extended losses after an industry report pointed to rising US crude inventories, adding to bearish signs for the market.】

item.title: 交易员从美联储会议纪要中寻找降息线索，美债下跌
item.description: 美联储最近一次政策会议的纪要可能为央行何时开始降息提供更多线索，美国国债在纪要公布前下滑。【原文：US Treasuries slipped ahead of minutes from the Federal Reserve’s latest policy meeting that could provide more clues on when the central bank will start cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 德国年初工资跳涨，通胀放缓面临风险
item.description: 2024 年伊始，德国工资大幅上涨，这对欧洲中央银行来说是一个打击，因为该行正在决定通胀是否放缓到足以降低利率的程度。【原文：German wages rose sharply at the start of 2024 — dealing a blow to the European Central Bank as it decides whether inflation is slowing enough to reduce interest rates.】

item.title: 犹他州仍在遭受网络攻击时，联合健康公司（UnitedHealth）大肆宣扬网络攻击修复工作
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc.’s claims that it had made progress fixing some systems in the weeks after a crippling cyberattack frustrated state health officials who said they were still having problems.】

item.title: 菲律宾称缺少 19 万名医护人员
item.description: 菲律宾卫生部长特奥多罗-赫博萨（Teodoro Herbosa）说，菲律宾需要填补 190,000 名医护人员的缺口，这促使政府考虑采取一系列福利措施来留住他们。【原文：The Philippines needs to plug a shortage of 190,000 healthcare workers, Health Secretary Teodoro Herbosa said, prompting the government to consider a clutch of benefits to make them stay.】

item.title: 诺和诺德一周内第二次在丹麦遭遇火灾
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在丹麦的一家制药厂发生火灾，这是一周内发生的第二起此类事件。【原文：A Novo Nordisk A/S facility has caught fire at one of the drugmaker’s sites in Denmark, in the second such incident in a week.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）法庭案件危及对奥地利的天然气供应
item.description: 奥地利对俄罗斯天然气的依赖正在经受考验，此前 OMV AG 警告交易商称，欧洲法院可能会中断其向俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）的付款。【原文：Austria’s reliance on Russian natural gas is being tested, after OMV AG warned traders that European courts could interrupt its payments to Gazprom PJSC.】

item.title: 橡树树称已获得国际米兰足球俱乐部所有权
item.description: 在意大利国际米兰足球俱乐部的所有者周二拖欠贷款后，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）获得了该俱乐部的所有权。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management took ownership of Italy’s Inter Milan football club after its owner defaulted on a loan on Tuesday.】

item.title: 对冲基金缩减大型科技公司投资，寻找其他人工智能赢家
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds have cut holdings in megacap technology stocks while betting on a broader array of firms that will benefit from artificial intelligence, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 英伟达是巨型科技公司盈利胜利的最后障碍
item.description: 本周三下午，人工智能芯片制造巨头英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：A surprisingly strong earnings season for big tech reaches its grand finale Wednesday afternoon when Nvidia Corp., the artificial intelligence chipmaking giant, reports its results and gives a much anticipated outlook that could set the tone for the second half of the year.】

item.title: 韩国将继续禁止卖空，直至系统开发完成
item.description: 韩国总统办公室的一位高级官员表示，在开发出一套检测非法交易活动的系统之前，韩国还没有取消卖空禁令的计划。【原文：South Korea has no plan to lift the short-selling ban until a system is developed to detect illegal trading activities, according to a senior official at the presidential office.】

item.title: 普拉博沃与最大的政党合作，控制了 79% 的议会席位
item.description: 印度尼西亚当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）正在与该国最大的政党进行谈判，以组建一个能控制议会 79% 议席的联盟。【原文：Indonesia’s President-elect Prabowo Subianto is in talks with the country’s largest party to form a coalition that would control 79% of parliament.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 的竞争对手 XTX 因波动性降低而利润下滑
item.description: 亿万富翁亚历克斯-格尔科（Alex Gerko）的 XTX Markets 去年利润下滑，使这家量化交易公司最近的盈利热潮戛然而止，而这家公司也因此跻身世界顶级做市商行列，与肯-格里芬的金融帝国并驾齐驱。【原文：Billionaire Alex Gerko’s XTX Markets saw its profit tumble last year, halting a recent earnings boom that vaulted the quantitative trading firm into the ranks of the world’s top market-makers alongside Ken Griffin’s financial empire.】

item.title: 意大利地产巨头以 1.8 亿英镑收购伦敦豪华酒店
item.description: 意大利最著名的酒店经营者之一已同意以约 1.8 亿英镑（约合 2.29 亿美元）的价格收购位于贝斯沃特的一家豪华酒店，这是伦敦今年最大的房地产交易之一。【原文：One of Italy’s best-known hoteliers has agreed to purchase a luxury hotel in Bayswater for roughly £180 million ($229 million), one of London’s biggest property deals this year.】

item.title: ING 开始出售法国零售抵押贷款组合
item.description: ING Groep NV 已开始出售其在法国的抵押贷款组合，据知情人士透露，该银行正着手完成从法国零售银行业务的退出。【原文：ING Groep NV has started selling its mortgage portfolio in France as the lender moves to complete its exit from retail banking in the country, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利亚洲区首席执行官称东京正在赶超竞争对手的枢纽城市
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）亚洲首席执行官表示，随着东京经济走出长达数十年的通货紧缩，东京正在追赶亚洲竞争对手的金融中心，从而提升了管理金融资产的潜力。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s chief executive officer for Asia said Tokyo is catching up with rival financial hubs in Asia as its economy crawls out of decades-long deflation, boosting the potential for managing financial assets.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司与美国职业高尔夫球巡回赛合作，提供实时赛事集锦
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司首席执行官琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）在一篇文章中说，该公司正与美国职业高尔夫球巡回赛（PGA Tour）合作，为社交媒体平台的用户提供高尔夫赛事的实时集锦和视频。【原文：Elon Musk’s X Corp. is teaming up with PGA Tour to bring real-time highlights and videos from the golfing event to users of the social media platform, Chief Executive Linda Yaccarino said in a post.】

item.title: 南非食品价格下降导致通胀放缓
item.description: 由于食品成本下降，南非通货膨胀率连续第二个月下降。【原文：South Africa’s inflation rate fell for a second consecutive month as food costs eased.】

item.title: 美国和东南亚的亿万富豪表示高税收是最大风险
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，美国和东南亚的亿万富豪家族表示，税收增加是未来五年的最大风险，超过了包括重大冲突和气候变化在内的其他担忧。【原文：Billionaire families in the US and Southeast Asia say higher taxes are the biggest risk over the next five years, topping other concerns including major conflicts and climate change, according to a new report.】

item.title: 印尼维持主要利率不变，印尼盾压力减弱
item.description: 印尼央行在上个月意外加息后保持基准利率稳定，减轻了货币压力。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate steady after a surprise rate hike last month reduced the pressure on the currency.】
